trans-unit.source: File '{0}' doesn't contain an embedded PDB.
trans-unit.target: File '{0}' doesn't contain an embedded PDB.

trans-unit.source: Only one dll/exe can be specified
trans-unit.target: Only one dll/exe can be specified

trans-unit.source: File '{0}' not found or doesn't match '{1}'.
trans-unit.target: File '{0}' not found or doesn't match '{1}'.

trans-unit.source: File '{0}' is neither associated with PDB nor does it embed PDB.
trans-unit.target: File '{0}' is neither associated with PDB nor does it embed PDB.

trans-unit.source:
Usage: Pdb2Pdb <dll/exe path> [/pdb <path>] [/out <path>] [/extract]
/pdb <path> Path to the PDB to convert. If not specified explicitly, the PDB referenced by or embedded in the DLL/EXE is used. /out <path> Output PDB path. /extract Extract PDB embedded in the DLL/EXE. /sourcelink Preserve Source Link when converting from Portable PDB to Windows PDB, instead of converting to srcsrv format. /verbose Print detailed diagnostics.
/extract and /pdb are mutually exclusive.
trans-unit.target:
Usage: Pdb2Pdb <dll/exe path> [/pdb <path>] [/out <path>] [/extract]
/pdb <path> Path to the PDB to convert. If not specified explicitly, the PDB referenced by or embedded in the DLL/EXE is used. /out <path> Output PDB path. /extract Extract PDB embedded in the DLL/EXE. /sourcelink Preserve Source Link when converting from Portable PDB to Windows PDB, instead of converting to srcsrv format. /verbose Print detailed diagnostics.
/extract and /pdb are mutually exclusive.

trans-unit.source: Invalid PDB path in Debug Directory (file '{0}').
trans-unit.target: Invalid PDB path in Debug Directory (file '{0}').
